metadata.Title: CVE-2023-42117 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
[Exim Improper Neutralization of Special Elements Remote Code ExecutionVulnerability]

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-42117` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

exim4 - 4.95-4ubuntu2.4
exim4-base - 4.95-4ubuntu2.4
exim4-config - 4.95-4ubuntu2.4
exim4-daemon-heavy - 4.95-4ubuntu2.4
exim4-daemon-light - 4.95-4ubuntu2.4
eximon4 - 4.95-4ubuntu2.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: exim4 package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.95-4ubuntu2.4').
